text: "Himni i Flamurit" (, meaning "Hymn to the Flag") is the national anthem of Albania. Tole, Vasil ==History== The Albanian national anthem was first published as a poem in an Albanian newspaper in Sofia, Bulgaria, on 21 April 1912. It was later printed in a volume of poems by Drenova, which was published in Bucharest, Romania.
